content: 9/11 WAS an inside job, and is a REAL conspiracy. I’m so tired of people whom have not done their homework talking about this. It’s just like the Kennedy assassination — the dirty little conspiracy that isn’t talked about at the dinner table for 20 some odd years, then we actually investigate and found out the official story is full of holes. Putting the moon landing conspiracy and 9/11 into the same boat is an insult to our intelligence.
